Uses of Package
io.github.cantido.qlearner.algorithm.model

  • Packages that use io.github.cantido.qlearner.algorithm.model 
    Package Description
    io.github.cantido.qlearner.agent
    The Agent class is the entry point to this library.
    io.github.cantido.qlearner.algorithm.exploration
    Objects supporting the exploration of the problem space.
    io.github.cantido.qlearner.algorithm.model
    The variable types and objects that form the QLearning model.
    io.github.cantido.qlearner.algorithm.quality
    Classes for representing and manipulating Quality values.
    io.github.cantido.qlearner.client
    Base classes that must be implemented by this library's clients.
  • Classes in io.github.cantido.qlearner.algorithm.model used by io.github.cantido.qlearner.agent 
    Class and Description
    DiscountFactor
    The discount factor determines the importance of future rewards.
    ExplorationStrategy
    The algorithm that is used to determine the next Action to take.
    LearningRate
    Determines to what extent the newly acquired information will override the old information.
    QualityMap
    An object that can store the Quality values of State-Action pairs.
    QualityUpdateStrategy
    A strategy for getting the next Quality value after one learning iteration.
  • Classes in io.github.cantido.qlearner.algorithm.model used by io.github.cantido.qlearner.algorithm.exploration 
    Class and Description
    ExplorationFactor
    Represent's an agent's likelihood of taking non-optimal actions in order to explore the problem space.
    ExplorationStrategy
    The algorithm that is used to determine the next Action to take.
  • Classes in io.github.cantido.qlearner.algorithm.model used by io.github.cantido.qlearner.algorithm.model 
    Class and Description
    DiscountFactor
    The discount factor determines the importance of future rewards.
    ExplorationFactor
    Represent's an agent's likelihood of taking non-optimal actions in order to explore the problem space.
    LearningRate
    Determines to what extent the newly acquired information will override the old information.
    Quality
    The learned value of a State-Action pair's potential for future Rewards.
    Reward
    The desirability of a certain state.
  • Classes in io.github.cantido.qlearner.algorithm.model used by io.github.cantido.qlearner.algorithm.quality 
    Class and Description
    DiscountFactor
    The discount factor determines the importance of future rewards.
    LearningRate
    Determines to what extent the newly acquired information will override the old information.
    Quality
    The learned value of a State-Action pair's potential for future Rewards.
    QualityMap
    An object that can store the Quality values of State-Action pairs.
    QualityUpdateStrategy
    A strategy for getting the next Quality value after one learning iteration.
    Reward
    The desirability of a certain state.
  • Classes in io.github.cantido.qlearner.algorithm.model used by io.github.cantido.qlearner.client 
    Class and Description
    Reward
    The desirability of a certain state.
